Your Study Hub

You learn best with people. Use that advantage: study groups, accountability, and consistent practice with past papers.

The Social-Learner Advantage

Information

Key Strategies

  • Form a focused group of 2–4 peers and meet 3–4 times per week.
  • Use teach-back: after a topic, one member explains the concept to the group.
  • Rotate past-paper marking together to spot patterns and examiner language.
  • Pair with an accountability partner for weekly check-ins and goal reviews.

Free Resources (South Africa First)

Western Cape Education Department — NSC Exams & Resources

Question papers and memos; good official reference.
Open Resource

Siyavula — Past Papers & Practice

Free open textbooks and interactive practice; immediate feedback.
Open Resource

PaperVideo — Tutorial Videos

Short, exam‑focused explainers (useful for Accounting catch‑up).
Open Resource

Khan Academy — Accounting, Business, Maths

Global library; pair with SA past papers for context.
Open Resource
